field.comment: The URI where we need to redirect to to log in
field.name: authorizationEndpoint

field.comment: The application this provider is active on (if any). Some providers are used for client credential flows only and don't need user roundtripping.
field.name: webApplicationId

field.comment: The issuer we use for the application
field.name: applicationIssuer

field.comment: The issuer that the provider signs with
field.name: providerIssuer

field.comment: Set the discovery endpoint here if known
field.name: discoveryEndpoint

field.comment: Once a user requests a login, how long is that particular request valid?
field.name: maximumLoginWait

field.comment: Where to redirect to if successful
field.name: successEndpoint

field.comment: Where to redirect to if we failed
field.name: failureEndpoint
